mapper.sql: resource_id as resourceId, resource_name as resourceName, resource_desc as resourceDesc, resource_auth_type as resourceAuthType, resource_source as resourceSource, resource_num as resourceNum, file_id as fileId, file_size as fileSize, file_suffix as fileSuffix, file_columns as fileColumns, file_rows as fileRows, file_handle_field as fileHandleField, file_handle_status as fileHandleStatus, file_contains_y as fileContainsY, file_y_rows as fileYRows, file_y_ratio as fileYRatio, resource_fusion_id as resourceFusionId, public_organ_id as publicOrganId, resource_state as resourceState, resource_hash_code as resourceHashCode, db_id as dbId, user_id as userId, organ_id as organId, url as url, create_date as createDate
mapper.select: select distinct tag_name from data_resource_tag WHERE is_del = 0
SELECT count(resource_id) FROM data_resource where is_del = 0
SELECT tag_id AS tagId, tag_name AS tagName FROM data_resource_tag WHERE is_del = 0 AND tag_id in (select tag_id from data_rt where resource_id = #{resourceId} and is_del = 0)
select tag_id from data_rt where resource_id = #{resourceId} and is_del = 0

SELECT resource_id AS resourceId, resource_name AS resourceName, file_size AS fileSize, user_id AS userId, organ_id AS organId, create_date AS createDate from data_resource where is_del = 0 and resource_id in
#{item}

select rt.resource_id as resourceId, drt.tag_id as tagId, drt.tag_name as tagName from data_rt rt,data_resource_tag drt where rt.tag_id = drt.tag_id and resource_id in
#{item}

select field_id as fieldId, file_id as fileId, resource_id as resourceId, field_name as fieldName, field_as as fieldAs, field_type as fieldType, field_desc as fieldDesc, `relevance`, `grouping`, protection_status as protectionStatus, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate from data_file_field where resource_id = #{resourceId}
select max(resource_id) from data_resource

select id,resource_id resourceId,organ_global_id organGlobalId,organ_name organName,is_del isDel,c_time cTime,u_time uTime, resource_fusion_id resourceFusionId, audit_status auditStatus, apply_time applyTime, assign_time assignTime from data_resource_visibility_auth where resource_id in
#{item}

SELECT dr.resource_id as id, dr.resource_name as resourceName, dr.resource_desc as resourceDesc, dr.resource_auth_type as resourceAuthType, dr.resource_source as resourceSource, dr.resource_num as resourceNum, dr.file_size as fileSize, dr.file_suffix as fileSuffix, dr.file_columns as fileColumns, dr.file_rows as fileRows, dr.file_handle_field as handleField, dr.file_handle_status as fileHandleStatus, dr.file_contains_y as fileContainsY, dr.file_y_rows as fileYRows, dr.file_y_ratio as fileYRatio, dr.resource_fusion_id as resourceId, dr.public_organ_id as publicOrganId, dr.resource_state as resourceState, dr.resource_hash_code as resourceHashCode, dr.user_id as userId, dr.create_date as createDate, dm.project_id as projectId, dt.task_id as taskId, dt.task_id_name as taskIdName, (select GROUP_CONCAT(tag_name) from data_rt rt,data_resource_tag t where rt.tag_id = t.tag_id and rt.resource_id = dr.resource_id ) tag FROM data_resource dr, data_mr mr, data_model dm, data_task dt WHERE dr.resource_fusion_id = mr.resource_id and mr.task_id = dt.task_id and dm.model_id = mr.model_id and dr.is_del = 0
ORDER BY dr.resource_id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}

select field_id as fieldId, file_id as fileId, resource_id as resourceId, field_name as fieldName, field_as as fieldAs, field_type as fieldType, field_desc as fieldDesc, `relevance`, `grouping`, protection_status as protectionStatus, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate from data_file_field where field_id = #{id}
SELECT count(dr.resource_id) FROM data_resource dr, data_mr mr, data_task dt WHERE dr.resource_fusion_id = mr.resource_id and mr.task_id = dt.task_id and dr.is_del = 0
select id, db_type dbType, db_driver dbDriver, db_url dbUrl, db_name dbName, db_table_name dbTableName, db_username dbUsername, db_password dbPassword from data_source where id = #{id}

select id, resource_id resourceId, organ_global_id organGlobalId, organ_name organName, user_id userId, user_name userName, user_account userAccount, is_del isDel, c_time cTime, u_time uTime from data_resource_user_assign where resource_id = #{resourceId}

select id id, resource_fusion_id resourceFusionId, user_id userId, audit_status auditStatus, assign_time assignTime, apply_time applyTime, c_time cTime, u_time uTime from data_resource_user_assign where resource_fusion_id = #{resourceFusionId} and audit_status = 1
select * from data_resource_user_assign where id = #{id}
select * from data_resource_visibility_auth where id = #{id}

select id,resource_id resourceId, resource_organ_id resourceOrganId, resource_fusion_id resourceFusionId, c_time cTime, u_time uTime, user_id userId, operate_user_id operateUserId, audit_status auditStatus, apply_time applyTime, assign_time assignTime from data_resource_user_assign where resource_id in
#{item}
